title: 9-1-1: Contagion Promo: The 118 Faces Viral Outbreak in ‘Two-Part Thriller’
description: During a recent interview with TVLine, 9-1-1 showrunner Tim Minear teased a “very intense two-parter coming up a little bit before the end of the season.” Friends, the two-parter has arrived — and “very intense” is actually an understatement. ABC has released an explosive promo for 9-1-1: Contagion, which begins next Thursday, April 10 (8/7c) […]
author: Andy Swift

title: Ghosts Finally Gives Sasappis a New Love Interest — But Is He Over [Spoiler]?
description: Ghosts finally made good on its promise of a new love interest for Sasappis during this Thursday’s episode — but she may not be the one that Sas was hoping for. Creators Joe Port and Joe Wiseman first teased that Sasappis would get another chance at romance at San Diego Comic-Con back in July 2024, […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: 9-1-1 Season 8 Episode 13 Is the One Where Everyone Forgets Hen’s Birthday and Eddie Checks His Parents
